name: transfermarkt_search
description: Search Transfermarkt. Returns matching results with details.

steps.code: const results = []; document.querySelectorAll('.responsive-table tbody tr, .large-8 tbody tr').forEach((el, i) => { if (i < 15) { const nameEl = el.querySelector('a[href*="/profil/"], a[href*="/startseite/"], td.hauptlink a'); const posEl = el.querySelector('.inline-table tr:last-child td, td:nth-child(2)'); const valueEl = el.querySelector('.rechts a, td.rechts'); results.push({ name: nameEl?.textContent?.trim() || '', url: nameEl?.href ? 'https://www.transfermarkt.com' + nameEl.getAttribute('href') : '', position: posEl?.textContent?.trim() || '', market_value: valueEl?.textContent?.trim() || '' }); } }); return { query: '{{query}}', result_count: results.length, results };
steps.name: search_results
steps.label: Extract results
